sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {addNewPerson} from "../../store/actions/persons"; import {useForm} from "react-cool-form" import InputField from "../FormComponents/InputField"; const AddNewPerson = ({addPerson}) => { let history = useHistory() const { form, use } = useForm({ defaultValues: {fName: '', lName: '', age: '', email: '', phone: '', avatar: '' }, onSubmit: (values) => submitHandle(values), }); const submitHandle = values => { console.log( values ) addPerson(values) history.push('/persons') } const errors = use("errors", { errorWithTouched: true }) return (
) } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { addPerson: (person) => dispatch( addNewPerson(person) ) } } export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(AddNewPerson)
